```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
```

#read in and clean data
```{r}

raw_data <- read_csv(here("MLPA_swath_site_means.csv"))


initial_fig_data <- raw_data %>% 
  filter(campus == "UCSB") %>% 
  select(c("survey_year", "site", "lat_wgs84", "lon_wgs84", "mpa_status", "den_STRPURAD", "den_MESFRAAD")) %>% 
  group_by(survey_year, mpa_status) %>% 
  mutate(mean_purp = mean(den_STRPURAD),
            mean_red = mean(den_MESFRAAD)) %>% 
  ungroup()

```

```{r}

a <- ggplot(data = initial_fig_data) +
  geom_line(aes(x = survey_year, y = mean_purp, color = mpa_status)) +
  theme_classic() +
  xlab("Year")+
  ylab("Mean Purple Urchins")

b <- ggplot(data = initial_fig_data) +
  geom_line(aes(x = survey_year, y = mean_red, color = mpa_status)) +
  theme_classic()+
  xlab("Year")+
  ylab("Mean Red Urchins")

a/b

```
